name: Submersio
description:
Game created for Haunted PS1 Summer of Shivers Game Jam 2021.

How long have I been falling asleep?  The ship is oddly silent. Where is everyone? Something is not feeling right...  I must escape... How to Play: 

Move : WASD / ↑↓→←
Use     : E
Skip    : SPACE
Pause : P

JOIN the adventure of the unnamed protagonist in SUBMERSIO FIND items to help you escape the mysterious ship UNCOVER the mystery happened on the ship while you were asleep TWO endings for players to find out EXPLORE the ship, you may find places to go or hidden items

 

Created by @kxuan98 @mlwong54 @kerkzy @Hexcolyte @DigitalEcho

Tools we used to create this game

Game Engine - Unity

3D Modelling - Blender, Maya

Audio - FMOD

Haunted Playstation Render Pipeline - https://github.com/pastasfuture/com.hauntedpsx.render-pipelines.psx

Music Credits:

1) Robert Austin Music - Underwater horror ambiance

2) Fesliyan Studios - Footstep Sound Effect

free sound effects from https://www.fesliyanstudios.com3

3) Sound Library - Miscellenous Sound Effect

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCXm0O2N7IWtjSGv9tblq34g

Update:

If you encounter any freezing during the game, try press "P" on the keyboard to unfreeze it.
